Pre-Game Insights: The Phillies appeared to have the Diamondbacks right where they wanted after a night after striking out 13 times in a 2-1 defeat
Post-Match Reflections: Phillies manager Rob Thomson said he still has faith in rookie pitcher Orion Kerkering despite struggling in the last couple of nights
Phillies reliever Craig Kimbrel said the last two games sucked and he rolled up in here and it cost us two games
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Phillies' bullpen meltdown cost them a chance to take a commanding lead in the National League Championship Series
The best-of-seven series will shift back to Philadelphia for Game 6 on Monday
Others: The Diamondbacks' bullpen, led by Paul Sewald, closed it out for the Diamondbacks in the ninth, leaving the Phillies searching for late-inning answers heading into Game 5 on Saturday
